DESCRIPTION: This effect is triggered when the Job is changed.
It takes Job Effect while Equipment is equipped. You can only have one Job at a time.
Instead of lacking [E] , use the card by consuming Reactor. It disappears at the end of your turn.
Reactor is not available when using this card.
When used, if the remaining [E] is 0, the effect is activated.
When used, it is attached to the character and changes Jobs. If you already have Equipment, discard the old Equipment.
When you complete a quest, it turns into a Reward card.
Each time you are attacked, you lose HP equal to the Shock value and decrease it by 1.
Reward cards cannot be obtained normally. You can get it by completing a Quest.
At the end of your turn, it is converted to Block.
